turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Good morning. I need you to order a coffee drink from Peets for me.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sure, I'm ready to jot down the kind of coffee drink you want.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'd like the Golden Caffe Latte, with a touch of turmeric, honey and ginger.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay. Is that the coffee drink with the steamed milk?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, that is the one.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, add any type of pastry to go along with the coffee.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Any specific flavor you want? Like Danish or Cherry?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Mmmm. Probably the cherry danish. That's all.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay. I'm going to order this online for you. I just need to verify that I have your password for online ordering.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Sure, everything should be the same as before.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Now, do you want to to order from the downtown Cleveland location?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, the one you ordered from before, the one on Huron Rd.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: I've got it. I'm putting the order in now. Hold on.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Sure, take your time, I'll hold

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: I'm back. I placed your order for the hot beverage and pastry and it will be ready for you.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Great, did you get the total online?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Yes, I used your account information and the total is $9.50

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Good. I'm leaving here shortly.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Good. Your copy of the receipt should be coming to you now.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thanks again.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: You are welcome.
